entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Hearst
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:23 AM EST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Mainly sunny. High minus 17.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 17. Wind chill minus 34 this morning and minus 21 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 06:51 AM EST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Snow. Low minus 24.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. 40 percent chance of flurries late this evening and after midnight. Snow beginning after midnight. Amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 24. Wind chill minus 24 this evening and minus 30 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 06:51 AM EST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Snow. High minus 14.
entry.summary: Snow ending in the afternoon then mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming north 20 km/h early in the afternoon. High minus 14.
